## Follow-up study

.pull-right[
- Demonstrated utility of the severity model in a new dataset
- Included clinically-derived PCR measurements of viral load
- Patients (n=716)
  - with predicted severity score > 0.5
  - had higher viral load (p=0.0017)
]
